text: Allahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Al-Hayyu Al-Qayyumu La Ta'khudhuhu Sinatun Wa La Nawmun Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Man Dha Al-Ladhi Yashfa`u `Indahu 'Illa Bi'idhnihi Ya`lamu Ma Bayna 'Aydihim Wa Ma Khalfahum Wa La Yuhituna Bishay'in Min `Ilmihi 'Illa Bima Sha'a Wasi`a Kursiyuhu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Wa La Ya'uduhu Hifzuhuma Wa Huwa Al-`Aliyu Al-`Azimu
